extDesc.message: Double left/right or triple left clicks on WEBPAGE (not tab) to close tab. Reopen tab by shiftKey + DC/TC. Optional: an icon to either duplicate or close current tab; disable closing the last tab of the last window; switch behaviors of click/ctrl+click on links

extNo.message:
Click here to $ACTION$!

DCCT as well as many other extensions won't work on this page
  - Chrome prevents mouse/keyboard interactions by all extensions

extNoNeedRefresh.message:
Click here to $ACTION$!

DCCT just installed or settings changed - please refresh the page for DCCT to work on it

extOK.message:
Click here to $ACTION$!

DCCT works on this page.

iconDupTab.message: When clicking on icon, duplicate current tab instead of closing it

lastTabApp.message: When closing last tab of Chrome, change it to homepage instead

noMoreTabs.message: All previously-closed tabs were reopened! No more tabs to open.

optDocDonate.message: Donation helps development of more Chrome extensions including porting over my TableTools for Firefox extension that sort/search/filter/copy any HTML table in browser!

optDocTime.description: Options Page Setting for the Clicking Time (Speed)
optDocTime.message: How fast should triple clicks be?

optDocTimeUnit.description: Options Page Setting for the Clicking Time (Speed)

optNoIcon.message: Do not display any icon in browser address toolbar

optNoWhatsNew.description: Option for Displaying What's New Page
optNoWhatsNew.message: Do not display "What's New" page after installation

optReopenKey.message: Press this key + clicks to reopen tab

optRevertClick.description: Option for Altering Default Browser Behavior when Clicking on Links

revertClick.message: Revert browser behavior when I click or Ctrl-click on a link
